attrib:
DURATION: 55 / 55 / 55 / 55
BASE ATTACK TIME: 1.25 / 1.2 / 1.15 / 1.1
DAMAGE: 18 / 29 / 37 / 46
HP: 200 / 240 / 280 / 320
cmb:
MANA COST: 145
COOLDOWN: 30
desc: Summons two wolves to fight for Lycan.  Level 2-4 wolves have Critical Strike, level 3-4 wolves have invisibility and level 4 wolves have passive ability that gives them 15 HP regen.
notes:
If wolves are summoned during the duration of Howl, they will receive the buff until the end of its duration.
Spirit Wolves have 80% magic resistance.
Using this spell will replace currently active Spirit Wolves.
lore: The very enchantment that twisted his being also summons canine familiars.
name: lycan_summon_wolves

attrib:
DURATION: 10
HERO BONUS DAMAGE: 14 / 26 / 38 / 50
MINION BONUS DAMAGE: 5 / 10 / 15 / 20
cmb:
MANA COST: 15/20/25/30
COOLDOWN: 50/45/40/35
desc: Grants bonus damage to Lycan, all allied heroes and all units under their control.
lore: Blood-curdling wolf cries signal to opponents that Banehallow is among them.
name: lycan_howl

attrib:
RADIUS: 900 / 900 / 900 / 900
BONUS ATTACK SPEED: 15 / 20 / 25 / 30
BONUS DAMAGE: 15% / 20% / 25% / 30%
desc: Increases the damage and attack speed of Lycan and all units under his control.
lore: His animalistic symbiosis with canine kind gives Banehallow enhanced reflexes and hunting capabilities.
name: lycan_feral_impulse

attrib:
DURATION: 18 / 18 / 18
TRANSFORMATION DELAY: 1.5 / 1.5 / 1.5
CRITICAL CHANCE: 30% / 30% / 30%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 170% / 170% / 170%
BONUS NIGHT VISION: 1000
cmb:
MANA COST: 100/100/100
COOLDOWN: 120/90/60
desc: Lycan assumes his true form, increasing his combat capabilities.  During Shapeshift, Lycan and all units under his control move at 650 speed and cannot be slowed.
notes:
Hex doesn't remove Lycan's movement speed.
Lycan has a smaller collision size in this state.
lore: Forever a slave to his lycanthropy, Banehallow has come to accept his curse, and embrace his own savagery.
name: lycan_shapeshift
